name: @leandredev/sso_lib_nodejs
description: librarie de communication la base sso for nodeJS

scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist

scriptsDev.pub: git checkout master && npm version $npm_package_version && git checkout dev
scriptsDev.vMajor: npm run initNewVBrach && npm --no-git-tag-version version major  && npm run pub
scriptsDev.vMinor: npm run initNewVBrach && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run pub
scriptsDev.initNewVBrach: git checkout -b V$npm_package_version && git push --set-upstream origin V$npm_package_version && git add -A && git push && git checkout dev
scriptsDev.vPatch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run pub
scriptsDev.postversion: git tag dev_$npm_package_version && git add -A && git commit -m 'dev_$npm_package_version' && git push && git push --tags
scriptsDev.publi: npm run build && npm run vPatch

scriptsMaster.updateMaster: npm run rmDist && npm run devDistToMaster

author: hf-dev
